description:
The Develpoer Guide section of the nova developers docs (http://nova.openstack.org/devref/index.html) ha sa section called "API Reference" that contains a list of links to modules such as "nova..virt.connection (e.g., http://nova.openstack.org/api/nova..virt.connection.html). 

All of the ones I clicked on are blank, and they all have two dots instead of one, for some reason (nova..virt.connection).
title: Nova Internal API reference in Developer Guide has no content

comments.content:
The Develpoer Guide section of the nova developers docs (http://nova.openstack.org/devref/index.html) ha sa section called "API Reference" that contains a list of links to modules such as "nova..virt.connection (e.g., http://nova.openstack.org/api/nova..virt.connection.html). 

All of the ones I clicked on are blank, and they all have two dots instead of one, for some reason (nova..virt.connection).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lorinh

comments.content: This has been fixed previously, see https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/693464.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle

comments.content:
I'm not sure when/how the regression happened. But I proposed a fix in two patches that are waiting for review

 * https://review.openstack.org/1155 (remove the .. issue)
* https://review.openstack.org/1156 (remove autogenerated content)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lorinh

commit dcb867871548be2d06b8957e059b387efde17aa9
Author: Lorin Hochstein <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Oct 27 23:49:32 2011 -0400

    Fix to a documentation generation script.
    
    Filenames no longer have two dots in them
    source/api/nova..adminclient.rst -> source/api/nova.adminclient.rst
    
    Fixes bug 882889
    
    Change-Id: I71132962fb934e35efbe956b25e68982a5a34ad1
